text: Egan House is a Northwest Regional style house in Seattle. It was designed by Robert Reichert in 1958 for retired United States Navy Rear Admiral Willard Egan. The public development authority Historic Seattle restored the house in 2003 and owns it . It was designated a Seattle Landmark in 2010. The house lies within the St. Mark's Greenbelt. ==References== * ==Further reading== * ==External links== *Egan House at Historic Seattle *Egan House at City of Seattle Landmarks Preservation Board (2009) Category:1958 establishments in Washington (state) Category:Houses completed in 1958 Category:Buildings and structures in Seattle Category:Landmarks in Seattle Category:International style architecture in Washington (state)
title: Egan House (Seattle)
